snippet.title: RAM gameplay (PC Game, 1985)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for RAM, Dos PC game produced by Avalon Hill in 1985 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/ram/6702/
RAM is a very interesting game like puzzle, simulation. In this game you participate in the battle between Athens and Sparta in Greece. The battle between them takes place on the water with a lot of ships.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Circus Maximus - https://youtu.be/Rgj01ulAbFo
Computer Diplomacy - https://youtu.be/QebDUHMz8O4
Pro manager - https://youtu.be/BeKue7odVsk
